dragdrop.layoutStyles:
<style type="text/css">		
#q2_target_container0 {  
    margin: auto;
    background-image: url("decay_series_background.png");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;  
    width: 700px;  
    height:450px;
    position: relative;
   
}	
	.tbody .th {
    text-align: center;
}		
			.target {  
			  border: 2px;
			  border-style: dashed;
			  border-color: #999999; 
			  display: inline-block; 
			  position: absolute; 
			  min-width: 40px;  
			 
			  min-height: 40px; 
			
			  
			}
			
			
			.initiator
			{
				display: inline-block;
				min-height: 30px;
				min-width: 60px;
				background: #ffc;
				text-align: center;
				padding: 4px;
				cursor: move;
				border-style: solid;
    			border-width: 1px;
    			border-color: black;
			}
			
			.dragdropspacer
			{
				height: 50px;
			}
			
			#alpha {  
    margin: auto;
    background-image: url("alppha.png");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;     
    width: 120px;  
    height: 68px;
}
#beta {  
    margin: auto;
    background-image: url("beta.png");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;     
    width: 120px;  
    height: 68px;
}
#bi-210 {  
    margin: auto;
    background-image: url("bi-210.png");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;     
     width: 120px;  
    height: 68px;
}
#pb-210 {  
    margin: auto;
    background-image: url("pb-210.png");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;     
     width: 120px;  
    height: 68px;
}
#po-210 {  
    margin: auto;
    background-image: url("po-210.png");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;     
     width: 120px;  
    height: 68px;
}


			
		</style>
